name: Personal Service Tower
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Multi-Purpose Tuner" "202575" a Service Tower Library ( ie : #L "Android Service Tower Library" "202532" ) #L "Service Tower Shell" "202581" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Multi-Purpose Tuner + Service Tower Library = Service Tower Brain ( ie #L "Android Service Tower Brain" "202526" ) Skills: | ME,EE | ------------------------------ Service Tower Shell + Service Tower Brain = Inactive Service Tower ( ie #L "Inactive Android Service Tower" "203108" ) Skills: | ME,EE | ------------------------------ Details ------------------------------ #L "Android Service Tower Library" "202532" -> #L "Inactive Android Service Tower" "203108" ------------------------------ #L "Cyborg Service Tower Library" "202570" -> #L "Inactive Cyborg Service Tower" "203110" ------------------------------ #L "Nano-Supervised Service Tower Library" "202577" -> #L "Inactive Nano Service Tower" "203111" ------------------------------ #L "Semi-Sentient Service Tower Library" "202579" -> #L "Inactive Semi-Sentient Service Tower" "203109" ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Nice AC buffs for you. Great for use in tower battles.
